sentences.english: The students collected a bag of bark for their science project.
sentences.chinese: 学生为进行科学计画搜集了一袋树皮。

sentences.english: Running our of grain, the army had to live on wild fruit and tree bark.
sentences.chinese: 部队断了粮，只能靠野果和树皮充饥。

sentences.english: Her hands were like the dry bark of an old cak tree, wrinkled, rough and hard.
sentences.chinese: 她的手向老树皮一样生皱粗糙和坚硬。

sentences.english: Girdling and other treatments can induce polypoid plants to flower earlier.
sentences.chinese: 用环剥树皮等方法可以诱导多倍体无性系提早开花。

sentences.english: Cassia bark is just that - it looks like the bark of a tree which is just what it is.
sentences.chinese: 肉桂是那种看起来像树皮的东西，他本来就是那样的。

sentences.english: The females use their ovipositor to bore into the bark.
sentences.chinese: 雌蜂用其产卵器钻入树皮。

sentences.english: In Finland purists insist that only birch bark should be added.
sentences.chinese: 在芬兰，纯化论者坚持说只能加白桦树皮。

sentences.english: Elephants use their tusks to get food by digging up roots and prying bark off trees.
sentences.chinese: 非洲象用它们的长牙挖树根，扒树皮来获取食物。

sentences.english: He cut his name into the bark with his knife.
sentences.chinese: 他用小刀把自己的名字刻在树皮上。

sentences.english: Desperate for nourishment, the troops stripped bark from the trees to eat and boiled up their leather belts.
sentences.chinese: 部队缺少营养，只能剥下树皮或煮皮带充饥。

sentences.english: The bark was riven off from the trunk.
sentences.chinese: 树皮从树干上被扯了下来。

sentences.english: The African Elephant eat grass roots, tree barks, leaved branches and fruits.
sentences.chinese: 非洲象吃草根，树皮，带叶的树枝和果实。

sentences.english: During the summer the Shawnee lived in bark-covered houses.
sentences.chinese: 夏季的时候，肖尼人居住在由树皮覆盖的房子里。

sentences.english: Sapwood is the lighter colored wood growing from inside the bark to the heartwood.
sentences.chinese: 边材色泽较浅，是从树皮到新材之间的木质部分。

sentences.english: Some of the trees are stripped off their bark and mechanically quartersawed.
sentences.chinese: 有些树被剥去树皮，用机器锯成四块。

sentences.english: The monkeys strip the bark for food .
sentences.chinese: 猴子撕裂树皮来作食料。
